cocktails.title: Wilhelm’s signature cocktail
cocktails.text: Introducing the "Wilhelm’s signature cocktail," a sophisticated black and white Negroni twist. This cocktail harmonizes the Apollonian clarity of gin with the Dionysian fervor of herbal liqueurs, creating a profound interplay of flavors. The initial bitterness contrasts with the subtle sweetness, embodying the eternal struggle between order and chaos. Sip and savor this complex elixir, a tribute to exploration of the human condition in "The Birth of Tragedy."

cocktails.title: Antipas' signature cocktail
cocktails.text: Introducing the "Antipas' signature cocktail," a tantalizing twist on the classic El Diablo. This vibrant red cocktail reflects the dual nature of Herod Antipas. Infused with a hint of spice, it captures the essence of the Devil and the shadow, exploring the darker aspects of the psyche. Each sip invites you to confront and embrace your hidden depths in a dance of sweet, sour, and spicy flavors.

cocktails.title: Oedipal Reckoning
cocktails.text: Oedipal Reckoning, a polished cocktail inspired by the most famous Greek tragedy. This sweet yet bitter elixir embodies the complex duality of fate and consequence. Reflecting the essence of the inevitable Justice, this drink underscores the inexorable law of karma. This drink serves as a reminder of the delicate balance between destiny and the choices that lead to one's ultimate reckoning.

cocktails.title: CANACA
cocktails.text: Meet a captivating red cocktail that embodies the enigmatic allure of the night. This soft and sweet creation weaves together lush berries and velvety liqueurs, reflecting the seductive mystery of the Moon. Evoking the dark enchantment of Lilith and the shadowy depths of Hecate, this drink captures the essence of the Queen of the Night in her most beguiling, yet foreboding, form. With each sip, embrace the alluring yet perilous dance of hidden truths and nocturnal secrets.

cocktails.title: MAKAREUS
cocktails.text: A radiant cocktail that embodies the warmth and vitality of the sunbeam. This light and sweet drink combines brightness with a hint of floral calming, reflecting the joyous essence of the Sun. Representing the Helios, it celebrates talent, youth, and a world that is open to your boundless energy right away. An exquisite taste that invigorates the spirit, inviting you to bask in the glow of your inner brilliance and limitless potential.

cocktails.title: LU
cocktails.text: A verdant and herbal cocktail with a touch of absinthe, evoking the mystique of your Anima. This enchanting drink weaves together the threads of fate and destiny, much like Ariadne's mythic labyrinth. Each sip reveals layers of verdant herbs and the ethereal allure of absinthe, embodying the guiding feminine spirit and wisdom. Embrace the mystery and complexity of this elixir, as it leads you through the winding paths of your own inner journey.

cocktails.title: HERODIAS
cocktails.text: A luxurious alliance that epitomizes opulence and indulgence. The taste of pure hedonism. Crafted for the sophisticated young woman, it celebrates richness and the art of living lavishly. A decadent experience, inviting you to revel in the finer pleasures of life with a gentle hint of seduction that permeates this evening…

cocktails.title: Electra
cocktails.text: A mezcal-based cocktail that strikes a perfect balance between sweet and bitter. This subtle drink represents the transformational processes every successful businesswoman navigates, blending intricate dance of ambition and personal growth with a hint of refinement and empowerment. "Electra" is the ideal companion for the modern businesswoman, embodying both strength and elegance.

cocktails.title: LAIUS
cocktails.text: A unique wine-based cocktail that harmoniously blends sweet and earthy flavors. This exquisite drink symbolizes resurrection, capturing the essence of endless life as a universal phenomenon. Experience an epiphany that transforms personal existence, offering profound insights and a renewed perspective. "Laius" is more than a cocktail; it's a journey of enlightenment, celebrating the continuity of life and the power of revelation.

textBlocks.title: Lucidity Triptych – A Unique Immersive Theater Experience in Belgrade
paragraphs: Belgrade’s cultural scene welcomes a groundbreaking immersive theater experience with the premiere of Lucidity Triptych! Set in the exclusive Pinecone Theatre—a three-story house from the early 20th century, meticulously redesigned for this occasion—each performance invites an intimate audience of just 22 spectators to step into a dreamlike world. Moving freely through the space, visitors become part of a narrative that dissolves the boundary between stage and audience.
Developed over more than a year through an in-depth exploration, Lucidity Triptych introduces a bold new approach to theater in Belgrade.

textBlocks.title: About the Performance
paragraphs: Inspired by Friedrich Nietzsche’s The Birth of Tragedy and Carl Jung’s theory of archetypes, this theatrical experience leads the audience to the collision point of order and chaos, reality and dreams, performance and observation. The story follows Wilhelm, a writer approaching his forties, who, over the course of a single night and three dreams, confronts unresolved conflicts from his past and deep- seated family traumas that hinder his search for personal and creative freedom. Each spectator constructs their own sensory and emotional journey, shaping a unique perspective on the unfolding narrative

The three dreams reveal different facets of the writer’s personal transformation, unfolding simultaneously, making it physically impossible to witness the entire performance in one viewing Audience members can choose to follow the dreamer throughout, shadow one of the dream characters, or shift between multiple perspectives.

The first dream, Separation, explores the fragile boundary between passion and responsibility through the story of a young couple caught in the whirlwind of creative ambition and emotional dependence. The second dream, Shadows, delves into the weight of inherited family conflicts and the dark forces of the unconscious through a turbulent and painful story between a father and son. The third dream, Consequences, exposes the cost of ambition and the longing for recognition, as characters stumble over their own desires, pushing their ideals to the breaking point. Before the performance begins, each audience member receives guidance on how to navigate the narrative

textBlocks.title: A Fusion of Drama and Music Theater
paragraphs: Lucidity Triptych blends elements of drama and musical theater, creating a multi-sensory experience that immerses the audience on every level. With a combination of composed music and instrumental improvisation, opera singers Nevena Đoković and Nevena Matić perform selections from Rusalka, Carmen, and The Tales of Hoffmann, adapted and arranged to seamlessly integrate into the narrative.

The immersive format allows for heightened sensory engagement, as spectators can interact with the set and props, engage with characters, perceive different scents, and enjoy cocktails inspired by the show’s protagonists. These signature cocktails, served during the performance, will be available at the Pinecone Bar on the ground floor, further enriching the unique atmosphere of the event.

textBlocks.title: Creative Team & Cast
paragraphs: Behind Pinecone Theatre stands the production company Immersive World Production, with Alexandar Prudyan and Jovana Radovanović as the creators of the project. Lucidity Triptych is directed by Ana Bunjak, with a script by Alexandar Prudyan, adapted by Ana Bunjak and Alexandar Prudyan, production by Jovana Radovanović, and musical direction by Stefan Zekić. The set design is crafted by Aleksandar Stanković and Miloš Radovanović, with scenography consultation by Magdalena Vlajić. Costume design and visual identity are the work of artists Julija Miheeva, Luka Đuranović serves as the production coordinator, while Ratko Rakin handled the communication

The cast features actors Aleksandar Kecman, Milica Majkić, Julija Graut, Andrea Đina Ržaničanin, Kristina Kika Jovanović, Vedran Borovčanin, Maksim Mićković, Uroš Petronijević, and Nikola Pavlović, alongside opera singers Nevena Đoković and Nevena Matić. Harpist Sofija Sibinović performs live music throughout the show.
The performance is in English and intended for adult audiences.
Don't miss the chance to experience one of the most innovative theatrical events in the region!

Welcome to the enigmatic world of Pinecone Bar, nestled discreetly in the vibrant neighbourhood of Old City in Belgrade at the address Dalmatinska 5 (now Vladete Jerotića 5), Pinecone Bar, housed in an early 20th-century building, stands as a tribute to the rich history, lovingly restored to its former glory.  Here, amidst the vibrant city streets, mystery and splendour converge to create an unforgettable experience. Our first bar in Belgrade pays homage to the iconic past of its surroundings while embracing the dynamic evolution of the local artistic scene.

Step into an era of opulence and intrigue, where whispers of secret meetings and agendas linger. Our bar exudes an aura of old-world charm, reminiscent of ancient Greece's elegance and secret societies' allure. Located in the city centre, this speakeasy bar beckons to those with a taste for extraordinary adventure.

Our selection of tantalizing cocktails, expertly crafted to intrigue the senses and ignite the imagination, offers something you have never tried. Crafted with the finest ingredients and a touch of magic, these libations will transport you to a world of wonder and intrigue. Our interactive service ensures that every moment spent at Pinecone Bar is an unforgettable journey, where guests become part of the narrative and the night unfolds like a thrilling tale.

Stepping  through the doors of Pinecone Bar, guests are transported back in time, greeted by a mosaic floor in the entrance, reminiscent of eclectic aesthetics, and wooden stairs that lead to the second floor. The walls are adorned with artwork, stained glass, and sculptural chandeliers, creating a wonderful atmosphere.
At the heart of Pinecone Bar lies a charming courtyard garden, a tranquil oasis in the bustling cityscape. Here, contemporary comforts blend with Greek charm.
Pinecone Bar stands as a testament to the enduring allure of old tales, where tradition and innovation intertwines to create an unforgettable escape for the curious ones.

Immersive theater transcends traditional stage boundaries to offer a groundbreaking approach to storytelling. Here, the line between performer and audience blurs, allowing you to step inside the story and become an essential part of its unfolding. As you enter our immersive space, you are not just stepping into a venue; you are stepping into the narrative itself, surrounded by a world meticulously crafted to captivate all your senses.

Each visit promises a unique journey. In this interactive realm, the story envelopes you, inviting you to navigate through vivid scenes, interact with characters, and sometimes even alter the storyline. This level of engagement is designed to forge a personal connection with the narrative, transforming each performance into a distinct, memorable adventure.

Our actors navigate the space around and with you, creating a fluid and dynamic performance that makes you a co-creator of the unfolding drama. This intense interaction deepens the emotional impact, making every reaction and interaction feel genuine and impactful. You are encouraged to touch, taste, and fully immerse yourself in the environment, which heightens the sensory experience and ensures that no two visits are alike.

The unpredictable nature of immersive theater means that each performance is unique, shaped by the collective actions and decisions of its participants. The storyline adapts in real-time, responding to its audience—turning the theater into a living, responsive experience. This dynamic form of entertainment not only entertains but also invites you to step outside your usual boundaries, explore uncharted territories, and gain fresh perspectives.

In immersive theater, you don’t just watch a story—you live it. Join us for an experience that extends beyond viewing, touching the core of your senses and emotions, and leaving you with an unforgettable imprint of the tales we tell.

pinecone-bar.bottomText: Discover the allure of our exceptional mixology—book your table now for an immersive evening at Pinecone Bar!

andrea.name: Andrea Ržaničanin
andrea.text: A tale of pure hedonism and a life bathed in the spotlight. Champagne, caviar, rich men, and lavish places. When “all in” becomes a daily necessity—just to feel something, to escape the emptiness, to flee from oneself. But could she still go “all in” when the stakes are truly high?
andrea.quote: "I didn't choose acting - it chose me. I didn't know exactly what my language of expression was, but I always expressed myself..."

nevena_matic.name: Nevena Matić
nevena_matic.text: Her guise is mist, her deeds an enigma. She appears only in moments of the twilight of the soul. She is the key to the Self.
nevena_matic.quote: "Nevena Matić is a Serbian opera singer. She completed her master's studies at the Faculty of Music, University of Belgrade..."

kristina.name: Kristina Kika Jovanovic
kristina.text: A tale of pure hedonism and a life bathed in the spotlight. Champagne, caviar, rich men, and lavish places. When “all in” becomes a daily necessity—just to feel something, to escape the emptiness, to flee from oneself. But could she still go “all in” when the stakes are truly high?
kristina.quote: "Graduated actress and singer-songwriter born in Belgrade in 1993. Graduated from the Academy of Arts in Belgrade ..."

vedran.name: Vedran Borovčanin
vedran.text: Is it good to be an ambitious person? Is it worth stepping over others to reach your goals? What is the ultimate price you are willing to pay for your desires? These questions sound as if they should be asked by the devil. But the devil is always within, advising, nodding at your cruel decisions, and stepping aside with a smile when you face the consequences.
vedran.quote: "He began his education in elementary school.."

maksim.name: Maksim Mićković
maksim.text: Look inside—there is an eternal child in each of us, playing, laughing, free of responsibility, yet gifting us inspiration and talent. Sometimes rebellious. To live happily, we usually integrate him. But what if he absorbs us instead?
maksim.quote: "If I ever loved you I will always love you. That's how I go through life. If we ever loved each other, your little house will forever..."

aleksandar_kecman.name: Aleksandar Kecman
aleksandar_kecman.text: The greatest curse of any author is knowing exactly what you want to tell people, yet without the struggle against the boundaries of everyday life, nothing can be created. Stuck in a midlife crisis, trying to find balance in the dichotomy of the Apollonian and Dionysian forces within human nature, slowly going mad—no light can be seen at the end of the tunnel.
aleksandar_kecman.quote: "He speaks Serbian and English and he is active in domestic......"

milica_majkic.name: Milica Majkić
milica_majkic.text: We feel jealousy when we meet someone successful, yet we never ask what lies behind the façade. Where do the roots of tremendous success grow? Ambition? Desire? Or just vast suffering? Every story of triumph has a dark side.
milica_majkic.quote: "She discovered her love for acting in her childhood, through participation in school plays and drama sections...."

yulia_graut.name: Yulia Graut
yulia_graut.text: We feel jealousy when we meet someone successful, yet we never ask what lies behind the façade. Where do the roots of tremendous success grow? Ambition? Desire? Or just vast suffering? Every story of triumph has a dark side.
yulia_graut.quote: "Over the past three years in Belgrade, she has established herself in the local industry..."

nevena_dokovic.name: Nevena Đoković
nevena_dokovic.text: To be loved and cared for—isn’t that the key to happiness? But what if you must give love and care without receiving anything in return? Would you self-sacrifice, or would you grow up? Or perhaps, over time, you would transform into someone cold and distant?
nevena_dokovic.quote: "From January 2022, she has been playing the main female role in the cult play Phantom of the Opera at the Terazije Theater..."

uros_petronijevic.name: Uroš Petronijević
uros_petronijevic.text: Uroš graduated from Serbia’s National Ballet School “Lujo Davico” national/folk dance section in 2004. After graduating, he went on to work at the musical theatre Theatre on Terazije until 2014. During his years in musical theatre he worked and performed in other projects with “Bitef Dance Company” that were based on contemporary movement and physical theatre. In 2014, he joined Jasmin Vardimon Company before going on to perform with Gecko in 2018.

nikola_pavlovic.name: Nikola Pavlović
nikola_pavlovic.text: His name speaks for itself—the one who blinded himself, choosing to see the inner void instead of the sunrise. But what if he hadn’t? What if his thirst for retribution, his hate, had corrupted him, growing into something greater than himself? Where is the line where justice turns into revenge?
nikola_pavlovic.quote: "He finished primary and secondary school in Knjaževac. He entered the Faculty of Biology..."
